name: Torano - Hogs Head - Toro
additionalNotes:
Torano cigars, one of the top cigar making families in the biz, spans four generations in the tobacco industry, and prides themselves on expert knowledge and top-notch quality. Having their roots in Cuba, today the Torano family cultivates crops from the Dominican Republic, Nicaragua, Mexico, and Ecuador. 
The Torano family’s house blend. Comprised of choice Dominican and Nicaraguan long-fillers wrapped in a golden-brown Ecuadorian-grown Connecticut shade wrapper, this Honduran treat is sure to get your taste buds going. The extremely complex blend features a variety of flavors: subtle spice, creamy sweetness, a peppery earthiness – in a nutshell, it takes your palate for a ride.
